title: 1.8原版mod发布-传送弓mod
author: 1jomin1
txt_content:
大家好！我是作者    今天给大家带来我制作的第一个原版mod！因为是第一次做原版mod所以自然也是很小的一个mod，希望你们喜欢XD~

代码再此！还不快跪下！{:10_530:}/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:redstone_block,Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~1 ~ ~ ~1 ~-20 ~ redstone_block},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~ ~-20 ~5 minecraft:command_block 0 replace {Command:/gamerule commandBlockOutput false}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/summon FallingSand ~ ~10 ~ {Block:redstone_block,Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~1 ~1 ~ ~ ~-23 ~ air}}}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~1 ~-18 ~5 ~-1 ~-18 ~11 bedrock},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~ ~-16 ~5 minecraft:command_block 0 replace {Command:/replaceitem entity @a slot.hotbar.0 minecraft:bow 1 0 {display:{Name:"传送弓"},HideFlags:127,ench:[{id:34,lvl:10}]}}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~ ~-15 ~4 stone_button 4},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~1 ~-14 ~5 minecraft:command_block 0 replace {Command:/setblock ~-1 ~ ~2 redstone_block}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-1 ~-13 ~5 minecraft:command_block 0 replace {Command:/replaceitem entity @a slot.hotbar.1 minecraft:arrow 1 0 {HideFlags:127,ench:[{id:34,lvl:10}]}}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~ ~-12 ~6 minecraft:command_block 0 replace {Command:/fill ~1 ~ ~ ~-1 ~-1 ~-3 air}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-1 ~-11 ~7 minecraft:command_block 0 replace {Command:/setblock ~1 ~ ~ stone}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~1 ~-10 ~7 minecraft:command_block 0 replace {Command:/setblock ~-1 ~ ~ redstone_block}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~ ~-9 ~8 minecraft:command_block 0 replace {Command:/testfor @e[type=Arrow,c=1] {inGround:1b}}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-1 ~-8 ~9 minecraft:command_block 0 replace replies.author: 四月也-also
replies.txt_content: 做上1jomin1家的沙发~

replies.author: cheng000
replies.txt_content: 这不是MOD.....

cheng000 发表于 2015-7-22 22:20
这不是MOD.....
你仔细看一下标题，“原版mod”

replies.author: pca006132
replies.txt_content:
原版模组的话不建议用testfor，因为这样容易bug的，比如在远处一支箭着地的时候的同时你在原地发射一支箭的话你会tp到最近的那支箭那里而不是那个着地的箭

第二，貌似那个“传送弓”没有什么用啊，因为你这个系统里根本不考虑那个玩家手持什么弓的。。。

而且跪下smg
